gov.nasa.worldwind.examples.kml
Class ShapefileToKMZConverter

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.examples.kml.ShapefileToKMZConverter

public class ShapefileToKMZConverter
extends Object

Utility to convert a Shapefile to KMZ. This application launches a file chooser and allows the user to select a Shapefile, or a directory of Shapefiles. Each file is converted to a KMZ file, and saved to the same directory as the source file. Progress is printed to stdout.

convertDirectory

protected static void convertDirectory(File dir,
                                       String[] suffixes)
Convert a directory of files to KMZ.

Parameters:
dir - directory to convert
suffixes - All files matching these suffixes will be converted

convertFile

protected static void convertFile(File file)
                           throws IOException,
                                  javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
Convert a file to KMZ. The KMZ file will have the same name as the source shapefile, and the ".kmz" extension.

Parameters:
file - file to convert.
Throws:
IOException - if an exception occurs reading the input file or writing the output file
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - if an exception is thrown writing KML

convertToKMZ

Convert a file or directory to KMZ.

Parameters:

Throws:

javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - if an exception is thrown writing KML
